title: Vaibhavam Diamond Haaram with Temple Jhumka Pendants
materials: 22K Gold with meticulously set VS clarity Diamonds. Features Emerald cabochons and delicate pearl drops. Showcases superior Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Intricate diamond-studded 'addigai' (choker style) necklace with a central pendant featuring traditional temple design elements. Two detachable temple-style Jhumka pendants, adorned with diamonds and pearls, can also be worn separately as earrings. The peacock detailing within the lower pendant embodies auspiciousness and beauty, and the design is also rich with filigree work.
colors: Predominantly gold with a dazzling white diamond sparkle
accented by the vibrant green of the Emeralds and the soft luster of the pearls. A traditional yet stunning color palette.
occasions: or any significant family event. A statement piece for the discerning woman.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The detachable Jhumkas offer versatility, allowing it to be worn as a grand necklace or as a more subtle choker with the Jhumkas as earrings. The exceptional diamond quality and the durable 22K gold construction ensure this piece will be cherished for generations. An heirloom piece that blends tradition with modern elegance.
